name: Exodus (itch) (Microcosmoid)
description:
What lurks in the depths of the world’s most mysterious narrative artificial intelligence company, Exodus Ventures Incorporated? Some muse its conspiratorial plans for world domination while others are sure that the group’s elites made contact with an advanced multiverse dimension years ago. Will you figure out Exodus’s darkest secrets? Or will they get to you first? 

Created by We’ve Got Some NERV, Evan Brown, Chaitanya Patel, Mac Gagné, & Vishwa Gandhi
